description.en: Shūhei Wakatsuki, a man who lives and works in Tokyo, decides to take his girlfriend and her son to his old home to see his parents on New Year's Eve. While driving, memories of his father, with whom he had never gotten along, begin to surface. When they arrive at his parents' house, he and his father silently sit down to watch a New Year's TV show together and begin to talk.

biography.en:
Associated Names:
• Асано Инио
• 浅野一二〇

Name (in native language):
• 浅野いにお

Birth Date:
• September 22, 1980

Birth Place:
• Ibaraki, Japan

Previously worked as Takahashi Shin’s assistant on Saishuu Heiki Kanojo.

Asano created the acclaimed manga Solanin, which was released as a feature film in Japan in April 2010, starring Aoi Miyazaki. Known for creating character-driven, realist stories, ranging from slice of life to psychological horror, Asano won first prize in the 2001 GX competition for young manga artists. Yomiuri Shimbun described Asano as "one of the voices of his generation."

Satou Satsuki and Atsumori Ran were his assistants.

Married to Torikai Akane
